mapper.select: select * from t_blog where title like '%${title}%'
select * from t_blog order by update_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into t_blog(title, content, photo, update_time, description, user_id, type_id, views, appreciations, is_published, is_recommended) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{photo}, #{updateTime}, #{description}, #{userId}, #{typeId}, #{views}, #{appreciations}, #{isPublished}, #{isRecommended})
mapper.update: update t_blog set views = #{views} where id = #{blogId}
update t_blog set appreciations = #{appreciations} where id = #{blogId}
update t_blog set is_recommended = #{flag} where id = #{id}
